body:
The art is so good that I'm just speedrunning through it without reading what's written.. just enjoy the scenes.. with the whole page full of tsukuyo art.. ignoring the guy ...
At least it's not gangbang.. otherwise I wouldn't see it at all.. 
That's the good thing of doujin.. in hentai even if you just wanna watch an NTR one and you watch anime as well.. you just understand the japanese lines anyway.. in Doujin you can skip almost everything
